content:
To improve the Salesforce knowledge article search experience, enable:

* Search highlights and snippets
* Synonyms
* Promoted terms
* Topics
* Case keywords

Available in: Salesforce Classic and Lightning Experience.
Salesforce Knowledge is available in Essentials and Unlimited Edition with Service Cloud. It's also available for an additional cost in Professional, Enterprise, Performance, and Developer Editions.

Search Highlights and Snippets:

* Quickly identify the best article
* See how articles match search terms

Synonym Groups:

* Treat words or phrases equally in searches
* Find matches for all terms in a synonym group

Promote Articles:

* Associate keywords with knowledge articles
* Optimize search results
* Users see promoted articles first in search results

Manage Promoted Search Terms:

* View, edit, and delete promoted search terms
* Associated with Salesforce Knowledge articles

Enable Topics:

* Classify and search knowledge articles by assigning topics
* Use suggested topics for more precise searches

Article Search Results:

* How search works depends on search options, search terms, wildcards, and operators
* Uses custom search algorithms to return relevant results
title: Improving Salesforce Knowledge Search Experience
